decisions.question: Gate PTY worker_ready on startup readiness for Codex with relaycast MCP
decisions.chosen: Gate PTY worker_ready on startup readiness for Codex with relaycast MCP
decisions.reasoning: worker_ready previously fired on init_worker before Codex completed MCP boot, causing broker to inject initial_task too early. Gate now requires post-boot prompt detection (or timeout fallback) before emitting worker_ready.
